price: and tell them that the water is to be shared between them[10]; each should take its drink in turn.
arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ
footnotes: [10] i.e., one day for the tribe of Thamūd and one day for the she-camel.
